quest: -mqid 0 -name Quest Complete! -condition a claimquest >= 0 -desc Claim 1 quest. (hint: !cq 1)  -reward xp 1
-mqid 1 -name Hard Work -condition a work >= 50 -desc Work for a total of $50 (hint: !w) -reward xp 200 money 500
-mqid 2 -name Hard Work 2 -condition a work >= 5000 -desc Work for a total of $5000 -reward xp 5000 money 10000
-mqid 3 -name Hard Work 3 -condition a work >= 20000 -desc Earn a total of $20000 from !work -reward money 200000
-mqid 4 -name Hard Work 4 -condition a work >= 50000 -desc Earn $50000 by working -reward money 500000

-mqid 5 -name Power Up 1 -flavortext Upgrade all stats once (hint: !u all) -condition c upgrade.current >= 2 -desc Upgrade your attack stat to level 2 -special stat = attack -condition c upgrade.current >= 2 -desc Upgrade your defense stat to level 2 -special stat = defense -condition c upgrade.current >= 2 -desc Upgrade your health stat to level 2 -special stat = health -reward xp 250 money 500

-mqid 6 -name Power Up 2 -flavortext Upgrade all stats to level 10 (hint: !u all 8) -condition c upgrade.current >= 10 -desc Upgrade your attack stat to level 10 -special stat = attack -condition c upgrade.current >= 10 -desc Upgrade your defense stat to level 10 -special stat = defense -condition c upgrade.current >= 10 -desc Upgrade your health stat to level 10 -special stat = health -reward xp 1000 money 2000

-mqid 7 -name Power Up 3 -flavortext Upgrade all stats to level 20 -condition c upgrade.current >= 20 -desc Upgrade your attack stat to level 20 -special stat = attack -condition c upgrade.current >= 20 -desc Upgrade your defense stat to level 20 -special stat = defense -condition c upgrade.current >= 20 -desc Upgrade your health stat to level 20 -special stat = health -reward xp 50000 money 50000

-mqid 8 -name Power Up 4 -flavortext Upgrade all stats to level 40 (hint: !u all 9) -condition c upgrade.current >= 40 -desc Upgrade your attack stat to level 40 -special stat = attack -condition c upgrade.current >= 40 -desc Upgrade your defense stat to level 40 -special stat = defense -condition c upgrade.current >= 40 -desc Upgrade your health stat to level 40 -special stat = health -reward consum.box 5

-mqid 9 -name Power Up 5 -flavortext Upgrade all stats to level 60 (hint: !u all 9) -condition c upgrade.current >= 60 -desc Upgrade your attack stat to level 60 -special stat = attack -condition c upgrade.current >= 60 -desc Upgrade your defense stat to level 60 -special stat = defense -condition c upgrade.current >= 60 -desc Upgrade your health stat to level 60 -special stat = health -reward consum.box 10

-mqid 10 -name Power Up 6 -flavortext Upgrade all stats to level 80 (hint: !u all 9) -condition c upgrade.current >= 80 -desc Upgrade your attack stat to level 80 -special stat = attack -condition c upgrade.current >= 80 -desc Upgrade your defense stat to level 80 -special stat = defense -condition c upgrade.current >= 80 -desc Upgrade your health stat to level 80 -special stat = health -reward consum.box 20
-mqid 11 -name Level Up -condition c user.level >= 5 -desc Reach level 5 (hint: use !p to see your profile) -reward xp 500 money 1000
-mqid 12 -name Classy -condition c user >= 1 -desc Choose a class -special triangleid > 0 -reward xp 500 money 1000
-mqid 13 -name Traveller -condition c travel >= 1 -desc Travel to an instance (hint: use !travel graveyard) -reward xp 500 money 1000
-mqid 14 -name I shouldn't have done this  -condition a raidAttack >= 1 -desc Die once (hint: !ratk) -special user.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 500 money 1000
-mqid 15 -name I can hear angels -condition a revive >= 1 -desc Revive yourself once (hint: !rez) -reward xp 500 money 1000
-mqid 16 -name Gravekeeper -condition a raidAttack >= 1 -desc Kill a mob in the graveyard -special raid.location = graveyard -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 500 money 1000
-mqid 17 -name Undead Hunter -condition a raidAttack >= 5 -desc Kill 5 mobs in the graveyard -special raid.location = graveyard -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 1500 money 2000

-mqid 18 -name Midnight Shift -condition a raidAttack >= 25 -desc Kill 25 mobs in the graveyard -special raid.location = graveyard -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -condition a raidAttack >= 1 -desc Kill a Necromancer -special raid.name = Area Boss - Necromancer -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 5000 money 5000
-mqid 19 -name Daily Delivery -condition a daily >= 1 -desc Collect your daily boxes (hint: !daily) -reward materials 125 money 2000
-mqid 20 -name Show your support -condition a vote >= 1 -desc Vote once -reward honor 5
-mqid 21 -name Continous Support -condtion c vote.votestreak >= 7 -desc Have a vote streak of 7 or higher -reward honor 75
-mqid 22 -name I'm feeling lucky -condition a getItem >= 1 -desc Open a box (hint: !open) -special source = box -reward xp 750 money 1500
-mqid 23 -name Smelter -condition a smelt >= 1 -desc Smelt a weapon (hint: !smelt) -reward xp 750 money 1500
-mqid 24 -name Blacksmith 1 -condition a purchase >= 1 -desc Buy SIMPLE CRAFTING from the blacksmith (hint: !bs) -special pid = 102 -reward xp 750 money 1500
-mqid 25 -name Blacksmith 2 -condition a merge >= 2 -desc Merge any two items of the same rarity,twice (hint: !merge) -reward xp 1500 money 3000
-mqid 26 -name Blacksmith 3 -condition a smelt.xp >= 50000 -desc Smelt weapons to gain 50000 xp (hint: You can acquire weapons by killing Treants and Krakens) -reward money 500000

-mqid 27 -name Art of war -condition a equip >= 1 -desc Equip a weapon (Note 1: You can see your inventory using !i) (Note 2: You can view a weapon using !wi) (hint: !equip)  -reward xp 750 money 1500
-mqid 28 -name Art of war 2 -condition c user.weapon.rarity >= 4 -desc Equip a weapon of rarity 4 (Rare) or higher -reward materials 1000
-mqid 29 -name Medic -condition a heal >= 80 -desc heal for 80 health (hint: !heal) -reward xp 1000 money 2000
-mqid 30 -name Nudge -condition a raidAttack.damage >= 50 -desc Deal a total of 50 damage to raids -reward xp 1000 money 2000
-mqid 31 -name Strike -condition a raidAttack.damage >= 200 -desc Deal a total of 200 damage to raids -reward xp 5000 money 10000
-mqid 32 -name Brute Force -condition a raidAttack.damage >= 1000 -desc Deal a total of 1000 damage to raids -reward xp 25000 money 50000
-mqid 33 -name Level Up -condition c user.level >= 25 -desc Reach level 25 -reward money 10000
-mqid 34 -name Chop Chop -condition a raidAttack >= 1 -desc Kill a mob in the forest -special raid.location = forest -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 3000 money 6000
-mqid 35 -name Into the Woods -condition a raidAttack >= 5 -desc Kill 5 mobs in the forest -special raid.location = forest -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 10000 money 15000

-mqid 36 -name Treant Hunter -condition a raidAttack >= 25 -desc Kill 25 mobs in the forest -special raid.location = forest -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -condition a raidAttack >= 1 -desc Kill a Treant -special raid.name = Area Boss - Treant -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 30000 money 30000
-mqid 37 -name Level Up -condition c user.level >= 50 -desc Reach level 50 -reward money 30000
-mqid 38 -name Cave Raider -condition a raidAttack >= 1 -desc Kill a mob in the caves -special raid.location = caves -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 10000 money 20000
-mqid 39 -name Delver -condition a raidAttack >= 5 -desc Kill 5 mobs in the caves -special raid.location = caves -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 30000 money 50000

-mqid 40 -name Artifact Hunter -condition a raidAttack >= 25 -desc Kill 25 mobs in the caves -special raid.location = caves -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -condition a raidAttack >= 1 -desc Kill a Troll -special raid.name = Area Boss - Troll -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 100000 money 100000
-mqid 41 -name Level Up -condition c user.level >= 75 -desc Reach level 75 -reward money 100000
-mqid 42 -name Low Tide -condition a raidAttack >= 1 -desc Kill a mob in the sea -special raid.location = sea -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 30000 money 30000
-mqid 43 -name Sea Explorer -condition a raidAttack >= 5 -desc Kill 5 mobs in the sea -special raid.location = sea -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 100000 money 100000

-mqid 44 -name Ocean Hunter -condition a raidAttack >= 25 -desc Kill 25 mobs in the sea -special raid.location = sea -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -condition a raidAttack >= 1 -desc Kill a Kraken -special raid.name = Area Boss - Kraken -special raid.currenthealth <= 0 -reward xp 300000 money 300000

-mqid 45 -name Ascend -flavortext Upgrade all attributes to level 100 and ascend(hint: Use !ascend) -condition c upgrade.current >= 100 -desc Upgrade your attack stat to level 100 -special stat = attack -condition c upgrade.current >= 100 -desc Upgrade your defense stat to level 100 -special stat = defense -condition c upgrade.current >= 100 -desc Upgrade your health stat to level 100 -special stat = health -condition c ascend >= 1 -desc Ascend once -reward consum.box 50
-mqid 46 -name Skilled -condition a sp >= 1 -desc Use your skill point (Hint: !sp)  -reward consum.reroll 3
